section.title: PartOfSpeechLabel object type
section.para: A PartOfSpeechLabel represents one of several allowed values for the value property of PartOfSpeech objects.

example.title: Example: restricting part-of-speech values
example.programlisting: LexicographicResource: labelLanguage="en" PartOfSpeechLabel: value="n", displayValue="noun" PartOfSpeechLabel: value="v", displayValue="verb" PartOfSpeechLabel: value="adj", displayValue= "adjective" Entry: headword="aardvark" PartOfSpeech: value="n" Entry: headword="speak" PartOfSpeech: value="v" Entry: headword="small" PartOfSpeech: value="adj"
